Title: Azure Blob Client
Description: A Azure Blob client written in WPF 4.0.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Azure Blob client written in WPF 4.0.

Features
  • Nested folders
  • Multiple accounts
  • Browse with CDN
  • Upload and download with sub-folders
  • Drag and drop from File Explorer
